about_the_game:
Classic SpacePod now available on Steam!

In arcade mode, fight to save the world, and follow a path of battle that leads you forward into Time itself. Blast through the future to save the Near Present! Seek out and Destroy the runaway Technology that threatens to ruin Planet Earth. A player’s skills and smarts are tested in level after level of boss ‘Star Castles’, asteroid showers, and expert AI opponents.

The game is based in Earth's orbit, where you assemble a ship from various types of 'Pod' (Engines, Weapons, SolarPanels etc) - and attempt to destroy your opponent's ships. But beware, your opponents are never far away, doing all they can to break your ship apart, take your Pods and destroy you.

Action is non-stop! Easy to play and simple to learn, but not so easy to master.

Build your own spacecraft from component pods.
Orbit around a realistic planet Earth.
Unique 3D cockpit user-interface.
Rescue captured human prisoners.
Destroy your opponents with 6 different types of weapons.

Fight for supremacy in 4 different gameplay modes (Arcade, Rescue, King, and Deathmatch - Co-op or Competitive modes for all gameplay types).
Play cooperatively to defeat evil robots and the Starcastles they protect.

Travel through time and unlock technology from the future!
